Set9_Sorcerer_desc:
Sorcerers gain bonus Ability Power.

When an enemy dies after being damaged by a Sorcerer, they deal a percentage of that enemy's maximum Health to another enemy.

(2) 25 %i:scaleAP%; 10% max %i:scaleHealth%(4) 50 %i:scaleAP%; 10% max %i:scaleHealth%(6) 80 %i:scaleAP%; 12% max %i:scaleHealth% to 2 enemies(8) 120 %i:scaleAP%; 20% max %i:scaleHealth% to 2 enemies
Set9_Void_desc:
Get a placeable void egg. At the start of combat, it hatches into an unspeakable horror and knocks up adjacent enemies.

Each Void star level increases the horror's Health and Ability Power by 25%.

(3) Void Remora(6) Rift Herald(8) Baron Nashor
Set9_Darkin_desc:
When Aatrox or the holder of the Darkin Blade dies, the Darkin Blade is equipped to the nearest allied champion, granting them 400 Health and 15% Omnivamp.

After being equipped to a champion for 5 seconds, Aatrox will revive upon their death instead.
Set9_Bastion_desc:
Bastion champions gain Armor and Magic Resist. This is increased by 100% for the first 10 seconds of combat.

(2) +20 %i:scaleArmor%, +20 %i:scaleMR%(4) +60 %i:scaleArmor%, +60 %i:scaleMR%(6) +120 %i:scaleArmor%, +120 %i:scaleMR%(8) +250 %i:scaleArmor%, +250 %i:scaleMR%
Set9_Empress_desc:
When Bel'Veth kills an enemy, they leave behind Void Coral that she will consume. The first Coral increases her maximum Health by 50%, while further Coral heals her 20% maximum Health.

When a Void Coral is consumed, she deals 10% maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.
Set9_Deadeye_desc:
Innate: +1 Range

Every 3 seconds, Deadeyes attack the enemy with the highest percent Health and deal bonus damage.

(2) +20% damage(4) +65% damage(6) +140% damage
Set9_Rogue_desc: <row>(2) When a Rogue falls below 50% Health, they briefly become untargetable and dash to an enemy within 4 hexes (preferring enemy backline).</row><row>(4) Additionally, a Rogue's first attack on an enemy bleeds them for 30% of their max Health as magic damage over 5 seconds.</row>
Set9_ShadowIsles_desc:
After dealing or receiving damage 8 times, Shadow Isles champions gain a Shield for 12 seconds and become Spectral for the rest of combat. Spectral champions gain Mana every second.

(2) 40% %i:scaleHealth% Shield, 5 %i:scaleMana%(4) 80% %i:scaleHealth% Shield, 12 %i:scaleMana%(6) 125% %i:scaleHealth% Shield, 20 %i:scaleMana%
Set9_Bruiser_desc:
Your units gain 100 Health. Bruisers gain additional maximum Health.

(2) +10% max %i:scaleHealth%(4) +35% max %i:scaleHealth%(6) +70% max %i:scaleHealth%
Set9_Demacia_desc:
Your strongest Demacians become Elite and equip a random Radiant item each combat. Elites grant Armor and Magic Resist to themselves and adjacent allies, but this does not stack.

(3) 1 Elite, +5 %i:scaleArmor%, +5 %i:scaleMR%(5) 2 Elites, +20 %i:scaleArmor%, +20 %i:scaleMR%(7) 3 Elites, +50 %i:scaleArmor%, +50 %i:scaleMR%(9) 5 Elites, +100 %i:scaleArmor%, +100 %i:scaleMR%
Radiant items are stronger versions of full items.
Set9_Freljord_desc:
After 8 seconds, an ice storm strikes the battlefield. Enemies take a percentage of their maximum Health as true damage and gain debuffs.

(2) 5% %i:scaleHealth%, enemies are 40% Sundered and Shredded for 10 seconds
(3) 10% %i:scaleHealth%, enemies are also 35% Mana Reaved(4) 15% %i:scaleHealth%, enemies are also stunned for 1.5 seconds
Sunder: Reduce Armor
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Mana Reave: Increase max Mana until the next cast
Set9_Armorclad_desc:
Juggernaut champions take less damage as their Health decreases.

(2) 15% to 25% damage reduction(4) 25% to 35% damage reduction(6) 35% to 50% damage reduction
Set9_Challenger_desc:
Challengers gain bonus Attack Speed. When their target dies, Challengers dash to a new target and increase their Attack Speed bonus by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

(2) 30% %i:scaleAS%(4) 60% %i:scaleAS%(6) 90% %i:scaleAS%(8) 125% %i:scaleAS%
Set9_BandleCity_desc:
Your units gain 10% Attack Speed per star level.

If you have three 3-star champions, your Yordles can become 4-star, which gives their Ability a wacky upgrade!

(3) Your strongest 3-star Yordle(5) Two 3-star Yordles
Ties for most items are broken by the Yordle fielded most recently.
Set9_Slayer_desc:
Slayers gain 15% Omnivamp.

Slayers deal bonus damage, doubled against units below 60% Health.

(2) +5% bonus damage(3) +10% bonus damage(4) +20% bonus damage(5) +30% bonus damage(6) +40% bonus damage
Set9_Piltover_desc:
Gain the T-Hex. Every time you lose a player combat, the T-Hex gains Charges. Winning converts the Charges to Power for the T-Hex.

You may also sell the T-Hex if it has any Power, resetting the T-Hex and converting its Power to loot.

(3) Gain the T-Hex.(6) Gain bonus loot every round. Each loss counts as 2 losses instead.
Set9_Multicaster_desc:
Multicasters cast their Ability multiple times. Bonus casts have 60% reduced effectiveness.

(2) 1 extra cast(4) 2 extra casts
Set9_Noxus_desc:
Noxus champions gain Health, Ability Power and Attack Damage. This is increased by 10% for each different opponent that either you have conquered in combat or is dead.

(3) 160 %i:scaleHealth%, 16 %i:scaleAP%, 16% %i:scaleAD%(6) 300 %i:scaleHealth%, 28 %i:scaleAP%, 28% %i:scaleAD%(9) 500 %i:scaleHealth%, 45 %i:scaleAP%, 45% %i:scaleAD%
Set9_Zaun_desc:
Zaun champions create random chem-mods that only they can use. Champions can be modded once, and mods can only be removed by selling the champion.

(2) Gain 1 chem-mod(4) Gain 2 chem-mods (6) Gain 3 chem-mods and Overcharge them
Set9_Redeemer_desc: Whenever an ally gains a Shield, Senna grants them 8% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
Set9_Wanderer_desc: Ryze's spell changes depending on the Region Portal players voted for at the start of the game.
Set9_Shurima_desc:
Every 4 seconds, Shurimans heal 5% maximum Health. After 8 seconds, select Shurimans Ascend and gain 30% maximum Health and 45% Attack Speed.

(3) The strongest Shuriman Ascends(5) All Shurimans Ascend(7) All Ascend at the Start of Combat(9) +125% Ascension bonus
Set9_Preserver_desc:
Every 3 seconds, your units gain Mana.

(2) 5 %i:scaleMana%(4) Additional 15 to Invokers(6) 20 %i:scaleMana% to all, additional 15 to Invokers
Set9_Marksman_desc:
When Gunner champions attack, they gain bonus Attack Damage, up to 8 stacks.

(2) 7% %i:scaleAD% per stack(4) 12% %i:scaleAD% per stack(6) 20% %i:scaleAD% per stack
Set9_Technogenius_desc:
Gain a placeable Apex Turret with 3 upgrade slots. Upgrades to the Apex Turret will show up in your shop for 6 gold. The Apex Turret shares Heimerdinger's Attack Speed and Ability Power.

You may only have 1 Apex Turret.
Set9_Targon_desc:
All of your units' healing and shielding is improved.

(2) 18% increased healing and shielding (3) 30% increased healing and shielding (4) 50% increased healing and shielding
Set9_Strategist_desc:
Combat Start: Allies in the front 2 rows gain a Shield for 15 seconds. Allies in the back 2 rows gain Ability Power.

(2) 200 Shield; 20 %i:scaleAP%(3) 350 Shield; 30 %i:scaleAP%(4) 500 Shield; 45 %i:scaleAP%(5) 700 Shield; 60 %i:scaleAP%
Set9_Ionia_desc:
Each Ionian has a unique bonus within their Ability.

Every 4 seconds, a number of Ionians are enlightened to their spirit form, gaining 20 mana and doubling stat bonuses for 4 seconds.

(3) 100% Ionian bonus, 1 enlightened(6) 200% Ionian bonus, 2 enlightened(9) 300% Ionian bonus, 3 enlightened
